headline: What Recent Analyst Shifts Mean For Northern Trust's (NTRS) Evolving Story And Valuation
summary: What Is Driving the New Fair Value Range? Northern Trust’s fair value estimate has shifted from US$134.64 to US$137.93 as analysts update their models around the latest quarterly results and the mix of more supportive and more cautious views. The small moves in the discount rate and revenue growth assumptions reflect this tug of war, with bulls pointing to wealth management strength and a recent 3Q25 beat, and bears highlighting fee pressure, mixed servicing trends and questions about how...

headline: Northern Trust Asset Management Delivers Direct Indexing Solution on Envestnet Platform
summary: CHICAGO, January 06, 2026--Northern Trust Asset Management, a leading global investment management firm with $1.4 trillion in assets under management as of September 30, 2025, announced today it will make its institutional-quality, tax-managed direct indexing solution available via Envestnet, a leader in Adaptive WealthTech for financial advisors.
